sentences.en: By trade he was a dealer in antique furniture.
sentences.cn: 他以经营古式家具为业.

sentences.en: He claimed he ploughed all his money into his antique business.
sentences.cn: 他声称把所有的钱都投进了自己的古董生意。

sentences.en: He finds material at auctions, antique shops and flea markets.
sentences.cn: 他在拍卖行、古玩店和跳蚤市场中寻宝。

sentences.en: He has been trading in antique furniture for 25 years.
sentences.cn: 他从事古董家具买卖已有25年。

sentences.en: I don'tknow anything about this antique stuff.
sentences.cn: 我对于这种古玩物件一无所知。

sentences.en: I saw the vase in the window of an antique shop.
sentences.cn: 我在一家古玩店的橱窗里看见了这个花瓶.

sentences.en: I struck on that antique in a small shop in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 这古玩是我在上海的一家小店里偶然碰到的.

sentences.en: I struck upon that antique in a little shop in London.
sentences.cn: 我在伦敦一家小店里偶然发现那件古物.

sentences.en: Priceless antique furniture was destroyed in the fire at the stately home.
sentences.cn: 那座富丽堂皇的宅第里价值连城的古董家具在大火中付之一炬了.

sentences.en: She wore an antique gown to the costume party.
sentences.cn: 她在化装舞会上穿着一件过时的长袍.

sentences.en: Such a finding as this exquisite antique is rare indeed.
sentences.cn: 像这样一件精美古物的发现确实少有.

sentences.en: The palace is full of priceless antiques.
sentences.cn: 宫殿里到处都是价值连城的古董。

sentences.en: The Sunday antique market is a happy hunting ground for collectors.
sentences.cn: 周日的古董市场是收藏家的淘物乐园.

sentences.en: They are available in polished brass, antique brass or silver-plate.
sentences.cn: 它们有哑铜的，古铜的和镀银的。

sentences.en: They bought the clock at an antique shop in Bath.
sentences.cn: 他们在巴斯一家古玩店里买了这只钟。

sentences.en: Windsor Castle is quite literally an antique treasure trove.
sentences.cn: 温莎城堡确实是名副其实的古物宝藏。

words.tran_cn: 古老的，年代久远的；过时的，[古]古董的；古风的，古式的
[古]古董，古玩；古风，古希腊和古罗马艺术风格

phrases.tran_cn: 古董家具；古典家具；古式家具

trans.tran_en: a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable
antique furniture, jewellery etc is old and often valuable
a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable
